name: SUV Heavy: Highway Racing
description:
SUV Heavy: Highway Racing is the most realistic cars x drift racing game of infinity arcade racing. Drive your car smooth through Heavy traffic, earn cash, drive update, upgrade your cars and buy new z speed plus cars . Run your sport elite car smooth and be fast to perform car play and be one of the fastest drivers and get fastest driving experience in heavy traffic drive zone
Features:
- Endless highway road with traffic cars;
- Dynamic change the time of day;
- Realistic car physics;
- View from cockpit of the car.
